name: UNOS_THRR_DYSFUNCTION
description: This table contains items reported on UNOS THRR forms for organ dysfunction 24 hours and 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: TXP24_PGD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether primary graft dysfunction (PGD) was present for the patient 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PGD_LV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether primary graft dysfunction - left ventricular (PGD-LV) was present 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PGD_RV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether primary graft dysfunction - right ventricular (PGD-RV) was present 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LA_PRES
columns.description: Left atrial (LA) pressure 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LA_PRES_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Left atrial (LA) Pressure status 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PCWP
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure (PCWP) for the patient 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PCWP_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Pulmonary capillary wedge pressure (PCWP) status 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_RA_PRES
columns.description: Right atrial (RA) pressure 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_RA_PRES_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Right atrial (RA) pressure status 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PA_SYS_PRES
columns.description: Pulmonary Artery (PA) systolic pressure 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PASYSPRS_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Pulmonary artery (PA) systolic pressure status 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_DIA_PRES
columns.description: Pulmonary artery (PA) diastolic pressure 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_DIA_PRES_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Pulmonary artery (PA) diastolic pressure status 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_CO
columns.description: Cardiac Output (CO) 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_CO_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Cardiac Output (CO) status 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PAT_LIFESUP_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on Life Support 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_ECMO_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on an extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO) machine for life support 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_IA_BLON_PMP_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on an intra-aortic balloon pump for life support 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_INH_NO_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was receiving inhaled nitric oxide for life support 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_PAT_ON_VAD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on a ventricular assist device (VAD) 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_VAD_BRAND1_C_NAME
columns.description: Brand of the first ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_VAD_BRND1_OTH
columns.description: Brand of the first ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 24 hours after transplant, if it is not one of the available options.

columns.name: TXP24_VAD_BRAND2_C_NAME
columns.description: Brand of the second ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_VAD_BRND2_OTH
columns.description: Stores the brand of the second ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 24 hours after transplant, if it is not one of the available options.

columns.name: TXP24_EPOPROSTENL_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received epoprostenol 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_INOSP_EPNPH_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of epinephrine the patient received 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_INOSP_MLRNO_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of milrinone the patient received 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_INOSP_DOBTM_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of dobutamine the patient received 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_INOSP_DOPMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of dopamine the patient received 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LEVO_NL_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received norepinephrine (levophed) 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LVNLV_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unit of norepinephrine (levophed) the patient received 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LVNLV_MCGMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of norepinephrine (levophed) the patient received in mcg/min, 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LVNLV_MCKMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of norepinephrine (levophed) the patient received in mcg/kg/min, 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_NEO_P_N_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received phenylephrine (neosynephrine) 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_N_PN_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unit of phenylephrine (neosynephrine) the patient received 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_N_PN_MCGMIN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of phenylephrine (neosynephrine) the patient received in mcg/min, 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_N_PHN_MCKMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of phenylephrine (neosynephrine) the patient received in mcg/kg/min, 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_VASOPRESSRS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received vasopressin (pitressin) 24 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PGD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether primary graft dysfunction (PGD) is present for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PGD_LV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether primary graft dysfunction - left ventricular (PGD-LV) was present 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PGD_RV_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether primary graft dysfunction - right ventricular (PGD-RV) was present 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LVEF_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LA_PRES
columns.description: Stores the left atrial (LA) pressure for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LA_PRES_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the left atrial (LA) pressure status for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PCWP
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure (PCWP) for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PCWP_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Capillary Wedge Pressure (PCWP) status for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_RA_PRES
columns.description: Stores the right atrial (RA) pressure for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_RA_PRES_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the right atrial (RA) pressure status for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PA_SYS_PRES
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Artery (PA) Systolic Pressure for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PASYSPRS_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Artery (PA) Systolic Pressure status for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_DIA_PRES
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Artery (PA) Diastolic Pressure for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_DIA_PRES_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the Pulmonary Artery (PA) Diastolic Pressure status for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_CO
columns.description: Stores the Cardiac Output (CO) for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_CO_ST_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the Cardiac Output (CO) status for the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PAT_LIFESUP_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on life support 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_ECMO_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on an extracorporeal membrane oxygenation machine (ECMO) for life support 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_IA_BLON_PMP_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was on an intra-aortic balloon pump for life support 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_INH_NO_YN
columns.description: Stores whether the patient was receiving inhaled nitric oxide for life support 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_PAT_ON_VAD_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the transplant recipient was on a ventricular assist device (VAD) 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_VAD_BRAND1_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the brand of the first ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_VAD_BRND1_OTH
columns.description: Stores the brand of the first ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 72 hours after transplant, if it is not one of the available options.

columns.name: TXP72_VAD_BRAND2_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the brand of the second ventricular (VAD) assist device used by the patient 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_VAD_BRND2_OTH
columns.description: Stores the brand of the second ventricular assist device (VAD) used by the patient 72 hours after transplant, if it is not one of the available options.

columns.name: TXP72_EPOPROSTENL_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received epoprostenol 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_INOSP_EPNPH_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of epinephrine the patient received 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_INOSP_MLRNO_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of milrinone the patient received 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_INOSP_DOBTM_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of dobutamine the patient received 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_INOSP_DOPMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of dopamine the patient received 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LEVO_NL_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received norepinephrine (levophed) 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LVNLV_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unit of norepinephrine (levophed) the patient received 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LVNLV_MCGMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of norepinephrine (levophed) the patient received in mcg/min, 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_LVNLV_MCKMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of norepinephrine (levophed) the patient received in mcg/kg/min, 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_NEO_P_N_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received phenylephrine (neosynephrine) 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_N_PN_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the unit of phenylephrine (neosynephrine) the patient received 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_N_PN_MCGMIN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of phenylephrine (neosynephrine) the patient received in mcg/min, 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_N_PHN_MCKMN_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the amount of phenylephrine (neosynephrine) the patient received in mcg/kg/min, 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP72_VASOPRESSRS_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores whether the patient received vasopressin (pitressin) 72 hours after transplant.

columns.name: TXP24_LVEF_C_NAME
columns.description: Left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) 24 hours after transplant.
